mapper.select: SELECT MAM.COMPANY_CD , MAM.DIVISION_CD , MAM.MENU_ID , NVL((SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_MULTI_LANGUAGE( MAM.COMPANY_CD , MAM.DIVISION_CD , 'MENU' , #{langCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , MAM.MENU_ID) FROM DUAL ),MAM.MENU_NM )AS MENU_NM , MAM.PARENT_MENU_ID , MAM.URL , MAM.ICON , MAM.DESCRIPTION , MAM.SORT_NO , MAM.AUTH_GROUP_CD , MAM.PARAM , MAM.MENU_TYPE FROM MOM_AUTH_MENU_V MAM WHERE MAM.COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MAM.DIVISION_CD = #{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MAM.AUTH_GROUP_CD = #{authGroupCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
